name: Ferrari Challenge Deluxe
summary:
For over sixty years, the Ferrari has been synonymous with speed, excitement and glamour. Now System 3 brings all the high-speed thrills and unrivalled style of Ferrari to the home console with Ferrari Challenge on the PS3™. 
 
Players battle their rivals in a lifelike recreation of the Ferrari Challenge event, from Mugello through to Monza and Spa, in order to win the season and be crowned Champion. Win access to a stable of stunning motors, from the 250 GTO right the way through to the FXX. 
 
Players may also compete in the Practice, Time Trial and Endurance modes, race online against up to 16-players and share their customized cars with other players from around the world. 
 
Developed in collaboration with Ferrari engineers and with vehicle handling dynamics tuned by Bruno Senna himself, Ferrari Challenge is the most authentic and exciting next-generation racing experience that captures all the excitement and energy of the Ferrari Challenge
